Title: Prohibits any funding of the administrative costs of the state's paid family leave program by employers
Summary: Prohibits any funding of the administrative costs of the state's paid family leave program by employers.
LawCode: Amd ยง209, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to prohibiting any funding of the administrative costs of the state's paid family leave program by employers
